reviews.text: Nice small hotel located just outside the centre of Rome. But metro is very close so all the attractions are easy reachable (not in my case - managed to get there on the metro strike day...). It's located by the street with quite a heavy traffic, so noise is quite disturbing (especially at nighttime). Rooms are spacious enough, well equiped bathroom. Breakfast was nothing special, but not bad - some pastry, some cereals, but you can find some good restaurants on a nearby Viale Regina Margherita. The best of all was the price - below EUR 35 per night.
reviews.title: Nice and cheap

reviews.text: This hotel is far from most places you would want to visit, it was not very interesting but good for the quietness. The breakfast bar is not up to much. the rooms are really small, no air conditioner but you can rent a fan from the front desk.
reviews.title: A small cute hotel just outside Rome.

reviews.text: Nice hotel with a decent if basic breakfast, quiet area.
reviews.title: Not ideal with childeren go closer to Berberini.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very little to do in area after returning to hotel early evening with kids, nothing (i mean nothing) in vicinity open after 7.30 even to get a can of juice, unless your prepared for long walk.
reviews.title: Nice place/recently opened/close to Metro
